Review.Titre: Feedback
Review.Contenu: I like the website but was hoping for staking. Staking my ADA would be a huge lift during this bear market. Customer service was really good and were helpful with answering my questions. Buying and selling was easy and website layout is easy to navigate. Having an ACAT transfer option would make it easier for me to transfer additional money into

Review.Titre: Over-the-top verification does NOT serve the client.
Review.Contenu: I suppose iTrust is trying to "protect" us, but they would not allow me to change my phone number and my email and my 2FA without CALLING them, which DOES NOT WORK in my shift-work lifestyle. I need to be able to log into my profile and make changes. It was ENFURIATING and took multiple calls. Finally, they sent me a code so I could go inside and change the 2FA without a call. Idiotic. But Customer Support was very responsive and stuck with me, within their ridiculous policies. So they're great, but the policy is completely unacceptable.

Review.Titre: Good concept, needs lower contribution limit
Review.Contenu: I appreciate the service that iTrustCapital provides, and the interface is nice to use. However, the $500 minimum contribution at any given time is a huge issue for me. My SEP-IRA contribution (while generous from my employer) only accrues that much after a timespan of 2 months, so until I accrue that much with my employer, I cannot send these funds to my own interest account. Instead my employer earns interest on those funds while they remain in their bank account.

Review.Titre: Need lower deposit amounts.
Had a very difficult time rolling over…
Review.Contenu: Had a very difficult time rolling over funds. Was given incorrect instructions a couple of times.  Funds were not credited to my account for an entire week. The check arrived on a Friday, I believe, but wasn’t logged until Tuesday. Very, very frustrating.

Review.Titre: Access to costumer service is very…
Review.Contenu: Access to costumer service is very limited. My Ake an appointment with costumer service to talk about your accounts or problems is ridiculous. The platform actually is very easy an simple to access. Also I don’t receive any total value that you guys get from my previos administrators for the total value of the IRA transfer to your account; to make sure that PRIMERICA transfer all my funds

Review.Titre: Cannot complete buy/sell orders
Review.Contenu: Cannot complete buy/sell orders. Huge issueGot a response from IT, issue still not resolved. And one gripe I have with Itrust Capital you can’t schedule a call with them. Shows no appointments available. So I was able to call and got Robert on the phone right away. Really helpful, issue with KYC update. Sucks I can’t trade at the moment but at least customer service was 10/10.

Review.Titre: No possibility to self-custody
Review.Contenu: No possibility to self-custody. After seeing what happened in Canada, I don't want to have my crypto vulnerable to the whims of a government that decides that they are going to seize it just because they have a different point of view. It happened to our family once before when we left a communist country. enough said...

Review.Titre: Creation of IRA; communication
Review.Contenu: Application for and creation of my IRA was relatively simple, website is mostly friendly to navigate. When I had a question and used the communication portal to ask it, I never got a response.  Balancing the positives of easy creation and relatively easy use, with unresponsiveness to a simple question, I get a score of 2.5 out of 5 which I've rounded to 3.

Review.Titre: They have disabled the ability to sell…
Review.Contenu: They have disabled the ability to sell on their platform. They claim it’s a bug for everyone, but what function do they provide outside of the ability to transact with in an IRA.They were able to restore my account the next day. Confidence is shaken. Will have to see what the future holds.

Review.Titre: Right now I'm giving it 3 stars because…
Review.Contenu: Right now I'm giving it 3 stars because I just opened a account with you guys which was very easy very efficient and the emails was always explained correctly so going forward in the near future I'll see how it goes Who knows it can work itself up to 4 to 5 stars thanks

Review.Titre: True Value Issues
Review.Contenu: Values of coins do not seem to reflect daily fluctuations very accurately. Also, it's hard to tell overall value of all investments (whether I'm up or day for the day or overall across all coins).  On the other hand, the buying/selling is very user friendly and I love that the fees are literally only 1% for any buy/sell and there are no other fees. Also wish there were more buy/sell options like limit/stop/etc.

Review.Titre: The last person I dealt with was very…
Review.Contenu: The last person I dealt with was very on point and solved the problem instantly. Know for the several other individuals it took like 24 hours to get a  response back. Also, why can't you have someone live we can talk to rectify the situation. I'm happy all is done but it shouldn't take a week to transfer funds once the check is processed in your system. I love the platform and the layout.

Review.Titre: No limit or stop loss orders
Review.Contenu: I like having an option for my Roth. However the inability to place limit orders has cost me a lot as I’m in the accumulation phase. Later I suspect I’ll be unhappy about the inability to place stop loss orders. I’m not trying to actively trade but these would be very helpful to me since we keep having huge swings in the middle of the night that I’m not awake to take advantage of.

Review.Titre: Good and Bad
Review.Contenu: Positives:Customer serviceGood communication during the processSeamless IRA transferOpportunities:Limit orders are a must.More coins to choose from.Team up with an exchange to fix the limit order issue and give customers the ability to choose from a wide variety of coins, not just the large caps. Kill your monthly account charge and add 10-20 basis points to order flow.

Review.Titre: No updates were provided to me as to…
Review.Contenu: No updates were provided to me as to when my initial check deposit was received or being processed.  Not having a customer service number also made it difficult during this process.  With me considering moving hunderds of thousands of dollar to this account and not having a customer service number causes me a bit of concern.

Review.Titre: Foot dragging on getting my funding put…
Review.Contenu: Foot dragging on getting my funding put through. Once I found a working phone number...not easily. Things then went smoothly. You had my check, from rollover and was cleared and converted and your firm was telling me to mail it wire check.Glad that's done. Fine since then. HM

Review.Titre: Great overall service
Review.Contenu: Great overall service, opportunity and selection of coins. However the trading does not allow you to set buy and sell orders and all purchases are synthetic- you do not own your crypto keys). If iTrust added these 2 features it would improve the quality of service significantly.

Review.Titre: I have enjoyed the site but needs work
Review.Contenu: I have enjoyed the site, easy to use but would like to see more info, like % gain since starting and what tokens can earn by staking or if earning now (even if not posted) how much that is, as it will help investors stay in some tokens in a down market if they know how much they are earning by holding them.  Thanks, John

Review.Titre: Platform is easy to use
Review.Contenu: Platform is easy to use. I enjoy being able to have a self-directed IRA using crypto. The things I don't like are not being able to set Stop Losses or Limit Orders. This alone losses me $100's of dollars. Second thing I don't like is that every trade costs me around $100 dollars in fees. Over time this is going to add up to massive losses in my account.

Review.Titre: Good Product / Poor Service
Review.Contenu: I love the product offered by iTrust, but the timeliness needs improvement.  The funding process never goes as smoothly as it should and will take twice as long as indicated. Their support team is helpful but might not respond for a day or two.

Review.Titre: You still have work to do, but there is potential
Review.Contenu: It may be ok to you to have no live customer service you can speak with when needed, and have to wait days or weeks for a call back...but its not ok with us. Also you are not fast on the draw when transactions are taking place. I find you average so far. The gentleman that we eventually had contact us was nice and helpful to the degree he could.

Review.Titre: I would like to see more options to…
Review.Contenu: I would like to see more options to speak with someone on the phone. Scheduling a call for days out isn’t very helpful. In the future, I would like to see iTrust offer the ability to stake crypto in your account to earn interest. Lower the debit limit for deposits from $1000 to $100.

Review.Titre: Meh...
Review.Contenu: Although iTrustCapital allows you to buy crypto in your IRA, there's a lot lacking.  There's no ability to stake, no chance to earn interest, you can't borrow against your holdings, it costs $30/month, and a 1% fee both when you buy and when you sell.  It feels like a traditional bank.

Review.Titre: Generally speaking
Review.Contenu: Generally speaking, good. Provides needed service not readily available.Just wish there were more coins offered, the ability to stake and a mobile app would be nice. I do find the reports pretty useless. I would like to see a dashboard that show cost basis, current position / balance, amount held and performance per coin and overall. To get that today, it's a chore. Overall happy but there is a LOT of room for improvements.

Review.Titre: I decided to go with iTrust after…
Review.Contenu: I decided to go with iTrust after reading a review that stated they had more reasonable fees than others, for their self-directed IRA setup, monthly fees, and transaction fees.  I was satisfied with setup, but the "dashboard" is of limited use--doesn't allow any analysis, setting any triggers for buys/sells, etc.  Fees for gold/silver seem excessive--but maybe that's the norm.

Review.Titre: Wait Time
Review.Contenu: Wait TimeI am not sure if they are just backed up that much or what but it takes quite a bit of time to get a response. I wish that I didn't have to set up a call in advance because the wait time is like a week. When they do respond however, they are super helpful.

Review.Titre: For being an early innovator with…
Review.Contenu: For being an early innovator with respect to cryptocurrency and precious metals IRA investments, iTrust lacks in technology related to transferring funds- still using archaic wire transfers and checks via snail mail. Pricing in real-time data could be more updated. Still waiting on interest and staking capability of certain crypto assets. Security and safety seems excellent so far, however.

Review.Titre: Pros and Cons
Review.Contenu: Pros:1. Easily buy and sell Bitcoin2. Prices not too bad compared to other crypto IRAs3. Decent website experience.Cons:1. No way to enforce using only Authy for 2FA. When Authy is set up, there should be an option to use only that and not SMS for authentication.2. Should be able to set up limit buys and sells of Bitcoin.

Review.Titre: Recommended areas for improvement for iTrustCapital
Review.Contenu: iTrustCapital would merit a higher rating had its IRA account:1. charges less for transaction fees (or better yet charges no transaction fees)2. charges less for maintenance fees3. pays interest on cryptocurrencies held in the IRA account4. allows investment in more types of cryptocurrencies5. provides real-time human customer service support

Review.Titre: I rated them a 3 because even though…
Review.Contenu: I rated them a 3 because even though their rates are lower their crypto prices are significantly highly priced. When you purchase a crypto as well the figures between the fee and the price of crypto does not add up. When you want to sell also their crypto value suddenly drops as well. And then there is a fee in addition to that.

Review.Titre: Comparatively reasonable fees
Review.Contenu: Comparatively reasonable fees and rates.  Lack of details on the website concerning withdrawal procedures, taking possession of crypto and/or metals, taxes, etc..  Slow response to texts and rollover requests.  Orders almost always seem to be filled at an unfavorable price, often outside of the range that the market is trading in from the time the orders was placed, to when it is filled.

Review.Titre: Excellent customer service, but needs features
Review.Contenu: Excellent customer service - both in terms of quality and speed. Top notch.  Can't say enough good things about the service. To get to a 4 or a 5?  Need these added:-Limit Orders (!!!!!)-Staking-Mobile App-Ability to buy/write call/put options (this might be a stretch - but one can dream)

Review.Titre: I cannot rate I Trust Capital a 5 at…
Review.Contenu: I cannot rate I Trust Capital a 5 at this point. 2 major reasons. Not to be able to place limit orders is a tragedy.  I almost rated a 1 because of that...  it’s unconscionable to be forced to stay up all night to monitor if ur wanting to trade it.  Other big negative is not many choices.  For example I want to get into the NFT area, and I can’t in I Trust.

Review.Titre: The trading platform is too restrictive…
Review.Contenu: The trading platform is too restrictive and doesn't have any trading pairs to switch between crypto pair when there are rallies. The inability to do this especially when certain alt coins have large rallies compared to bitcoin and you would want to lock in those gains in Bitcoin and not dollars it makes little sense to sell into dollars to buy more bitcoin.

Review.Titre: It functions smoothly, but needs development.
Review.Contenu: I like the site, and the roll over was time consuming, but trouble free. I do have issue with the web pages lack of information about my portfolio. At this time all it provides is overall balance. Would like to be able to at least turn on information about my individual assets and trends since purchasing it.   Overall 3

Review.Titre: Scheduled my "phone" consultation more…
Review.Contenu: Scheduled my "phone" consultation more than a week in advance. Received the call earlier than was scheduled and was old that something had come up so my call had to be "now" or at some other point which would not work since I had other obligations on that day. I felt rushed and did not benefit from the call. Because you offered the Roth IRA I went ahead and opened the account.

Review.Titre: Great opportunity...with room to improve
Review.Contenu: I love the concept of being able to invest in crypto assets within my IRA. Itrust Capital has a great platform to do this. My only issue is the lack of options to communicate directly with them. You either have to email them, or schedule a time for them to call you back. I would love to see them improve this area, so you could reach them by phone directly.

Review.Titre: There should be an option to transfer…
Review.Contenu: There should be an option to transfer bitcoin or an alt coin into the  IRA account. Also, if I am HODLing, $30.00 dollars per month is too much. I have holdings in Celsius that give me  a percent per month. Grated, you are not a lending company, but maybe an idea to improve your customer retention.

Review.Titre: Room for improvement
Review.Contenu: Room for improvement, but still good and I will recommend it.Pros:1.  Fees are very reasonable.  Bitcoin IRA was a non-starter.2.  Terrific interface.  Everything on one page is nice!3.  Support was good.Cons:1.  Process for transferring my IRA went less smoothly than it could have.2.  Security kicks me out pretty frequently and I have to re-login.  It's not only after time outs.3.  Could use more coin selection.4.  No limit buys.5.  No staking.EDIT: JP Morgan was entirely helpful and professional and there was no friction on their part.

Review.Titre: I am very grateful for iTrustCapital
Review.Contenu: I am very grateful for iTrustCapital.  I converted my 401K to a SEP then to a ROTH and moved 95% to ITC in 2020.  The platform and mobile app is good.    However, the time it takes to wire funds and have access in my account needs vast improvement.  Maybe that is the reason for DeFi?  Customer service when you can speak to someone is very solid.  They may have been slammed with increased demand so it seemed difficult to keep up with the customer growth.  All in all I would highly recommend ITC.

Review.Titre: Pretty good so far…
Review.Contenu: So far it has been good and it appears safe. Gave it 3 stars because of no staking and no limit buys. I have been told both of those are coming. There still are some of my favorite coins that are not listed but they are adding as time goes on. If they had staking and limit buys I would give it 5 stars.

Review.Titre: Wish it was easier to talk to a person
Review.Contenu: Wish it was easier to talk to a person. I understand trying to keep budget down, but sometimes its nice to just pick up the phone and talk to someone.  Hetti g this transfer thing has been a bit of a pain. Some of the attachments that were sent are just headings or logis or something not a form.

Review.Titre: I think you're fees are reasonable
Review.Contenu: I think you're fees are reasonable, but the spread is very high. At least compared to other crypto/gold IRAs. However, you site is rather minimalistic. You choices of assets is limited, although I like that you have added a couple more options. The thing I really wish you offered is the option to do limit and stop orders.

Review.Titre: Good platform recommended
Review.Contenu: Staff has been great overall. Site has been responsive and always available when I use it. The platform only allows for market orders currently. This can be inconvenient for more active traders trying to optimize each trade. Hopefully this is something that will be available soon. The lack of limit orders and stop losses is the main reason for my current rating. Otherwise I recommend iTrust for your crypto/IRA needs.

Review.Titre: This is a good IRA for crypto providing…
Review.Contenu: This is a good IRA for crypto providing you're going to beat the $360 annual fees.  Beware of metals.  Surprise fees (a surprise to me when they went up drastically) and you're stuck with whatever you trade.  Also, it takes a long time to get your money back on metals.  When I tried to buy and sell metals to earn money in my IRA and I ran into these difficulties, I was told that this account is not for "daytraders." I am not a day trader.  Stick with the crypto if you use this account.

Review.Titre: Withdrawal very quick and efficient
Review.Contenu: Have made two requests for withdrawing funds.1. messaged -7/13/20 no response2. Phone conference 7/14/20 with Henry Melchor stated required pdf form.    still waiting. This is not acceptable. UPDATE:Once required withdrawal documents where signed our funds where deposited in our account within three days. That's much faster than excepted. Great Job

Review.Titre: I'm very excited about my crypto Roth…
Review.Contenu: I'm very excited about my crypto Roth Ira! and for the future of this site, but I think many things need to happen first, such as being able to do limit orders. Also, customer service needs to be improved, with better phone support and live chat support with an actual person.  That would be awesome!

Review.Titre: Improvements needed
Review.Contenu: Don’t have an issue with the service - I do have a major issue with not being able to call without making an appointment and having to wait 2-3 days. That’s just unacceptable to me. Im also a little dumbfounded at how little knowledge that person that will eventually get on the phone with you has... other than that, it is what it advertises to be - a way to invest into crypto currency inside an IRA and therefore without tax implication. Great idea. It’s a needed service that needs major improvements around customer service.

Review.Titre: Great Platform - Depositing is archaic
Review.Contenu: Innovative, reasonable fees, good overall experience.Just ironic that we are investing in the digital future of speed and efficiency, but to do so, we have to rely on wiring money.Update contribution options to allow for online access to major bank debiting and this is a five start platform.

Review.Titre: I am displeased about your decision to…
Review.Contenu: I am displeased about your decision to cease trading XRP.  If your view of XRP is that you took the action because of the SEC lawsuit, which is not resolved, then what bodes for your platform when probably most other coins raised capital in the exact same manner as XRP, but the differed that they have not been sued by the SEC? Your coin holdings are limited and, I suppose, with that cloud hanging over you, the platform may shrink to BTC and ETH? Otherwise, the interface is good and easy to operate.

Review.Titre: It’s a Good Start
Review.Contenu: The IRA’s lack many of the offerings, and reporting and analysis resources that virtually all crypto exchanges provide. I am pleased with the customer service but they need to keep upgrading and adding value for the customers.

Review.Titre: Funding acct is a hassle; $1k min funding on ROTH
Review.Contenu: Adding funds to my Crypto ROTH account is a hassle and takes a 2-3 days. You have to fill out a doc to request to transfer funds, then once you go through the DocuSign process you can only snail-mail a check or pay for wire transfer. Also, ROTH min funding limit is $1k.

Review.Titre: I am unable to print schedules of each…
Review.Contenu: I am unable to print schedules of each of my investments in virtual coins I have acquired in my iTrustCapital account, including: 1) although I am able to print a complete copy of my "Transaction History" report, I am unable to print a complete daily listing of my holdings and each coin's "Tokens/Ounces", and each coin's ""Price Per Tokens/Ounces", and "Market Price" at that moment in time. Please instruct me on how I can access the above printouts/reports.2) Please instruct me on how I can access & print a complete daily listing of my holdings and each coin's "Gain or Loss" report at that moment in time.

Review.Titre: Extremely basic
Review.Contenu: Extremely basic. You can buy market order crypto from a so-so selection in an IRA. No cost basis tracking. No limit orders. No stop loses. I found out about them from one of their affiliates that pushes this as a way to trade tax free, but without these tools, unless you want to sit and watch the market 24/7, you really cannot do this. If staking starts within a few months I would probably give another star. For what it is it works, they appear to be the most competitively priced, even with their wide spreads on market orders and I will use them for now.Average product.

Review.Titre: The system is down today
Review.Contenu: The system is down today - with no emails sent to customers, no response, nothing on the website indicating it is down for maintenance. Showing zero in my account. ( update thanks for getting back to your customers via email and online)

Review.Titre: My major issue is the platform
Review.Contenu: My major issue is the platform. There needs to be more features in requires to my positions performance. For example there needs to be an option to see 1 day, 1 week, 1 month performance of my account. Each position should show total % change, total return, today’s % change, today’s return.

Review.Titre: Bumpy start but issues have been resolved with help from support staff
Review.Contenu: It took over a day due to technical hiccups but I now have the account set up and authorized funding from an existing account at another custodian.  Technical difficulties occurred on two occasions which were frustrating so that's the negative. On the positive side I had at 3 different support personnel reach out to help and I have no doubt other technical people behind the scenes were involved as well.  I generally judge a firm not on its problems but on its willingness to correct those problems so ITrustCapital fulfilled its part.  I believe some technical issues should still be resolved and hopefully have been for more than just my one off issues.

Review.Titre: The website's user experience needs to…
Review.Contenu: The website's user experience needs to be overhauled. When executing an IRA transfer, there is no clear visual representation in the dashboard to indicate the status of the transfer. It took 5 days for me to realize that a form needed to be completed in order to commence the process. There should be an obvious notification (like a number 1) that pops up in the Document section notifying me that there was a form to be completed. Instead, the instructions to complete the form were written in small type in an unexpected place in the far right of the dashboard. Creating a status bar with visual milestones to show the progress of the transfer would also be useful communicating the status of a transfer to users.

Review.Titre: High Prices, No limit orders
Review.Contenu: - Good customer service during and post sign up. - Made roll over surprisingly pain free.- but can't place limit orders. - Prices listed are consistently higher than other exchanges. - No ability to purchase a specific quantity of an asset (ie. 100 SOL). Must enter a dollar amount. - Buys have consistently executed at higher prices than presented. (So even when using an amount greater than what's needed for 100 SOL + fees, I still only get 99.x)- The financial health of iTrust is important to me but please don't place investors' interests so far ahead of customer satisfaction than you lose us. Good start but must improve for me to use it more.

Review.Titre: NOT eligible in NY or HI
Review.Contenu: Looks great, except I went trhough all the steps to set up and then found out that I wasn't eligible because I live in NY State.  Humph!  I hope that NY can be integrated at some point.  I see that Alto serves NY and may go with them...

Review.Titre: Customer support via communications
Review.Contenu: Customer support via communications, whether written or verbal, is lacking. Speed of transactions and purchases is a positive. Product variability needs improvement (ie only nine crypto currencies, plus gold and silver). Would like to earn interest on investments.

Review.Titre: Easy creating account but very elementary platform.
Review.Contenu: Creating account and transferring money is simple and straight forward. But the trading platform is very elementary. There is only market orders and you have to contact support to make a withdrawal. Support is quick to respond.

Review.Titre: ITrustCapital was average at best
Review.Contenu: ITrustCapital was, at best, average when it came to customer service, the information they shared with me, and resolving my issue.  I wasn’t extremely dissatisfied with their service, but neither was I completely or extremely satisfied with it either.  I did a 401K Rollover to a Roth IRA and it didn't go smoothly at all.  I received an email from iTC saying they had received the check from my prior institution about 7 to 10 days after I began the process.  The email said it would be "3 business days" before I could actually start buying assets through iTC.  3 busness days came and went, and I wasn't able to buy anything.  It took almost a month of emails with 3 or 4 different iTC CSRs before I was actually able to buy the assets I wanted for my Roth IRA.  Not strong work there iTC!I had hoped for a better experience coming on board.  We’ll see how things go from here.

Review.Titre: Funding took a long time
Review.Contenu: There was not enough clear information about the funding through a rollover.  It took much longer than expected.  The scheduling of phone support is great.

Review.Titre: Meh not terrible not great
Review.Contenu: It is a super-pain in the a*$*$ to simply make a deposit in any way shape or form. I expect to get some bull$-hit boiler plate explanation that it has to be ridiculously difficult to make deposits. Don’t bother, I’ll just ignore it.

Review.Titre: It took way too long to transfer money into my trading account.
Review.Contenu: My only complaint is that it took so long to make my money available for trading.  7 days to clear a check?  Aren't you in the blockchain business?  Because of this delay, I lost out on tens of thousands of shares in the digital currency I wanted to purchase.

Review.Titre: Overall I am quite satisfied, however
Review.Contenu: Overall I am quite satisfied, however I have had difficulty with the funds transfer process. It would also be beneficial if customers could place a bid to make a trade as with all other exchanges, rather than having to trade on the spot.

Review.Titre: My initial impression was …
Review.Contenu: My initial impression was that setting up the account was going to be a bit difficult.  You get a questionnaire that you are supposed to fill out by asking your current IRS custodian for the answers.  My custodian obviously did not like the questions and the most frequent response something like "we work that out with them.  They know what to do."  However, once I sent that form to iTrust the account was funded very quickly.  The major reason for my 3 star score is the limited crypto choices.  I have no idea what hoops iTrust has to jump through to get a crypto approved for inclusion, but I am hoping the choices will expand.

Review.Titre: As I am new to crypto
Review.Contenu: As I am new to crypto, let alone crypto IRA's, I really have no basis of comparison, so my star rating is probably not accurate. The rollover from my 503b to my iTrust account was painfully slow. I don't know if that is normal, but was caught off guard as I watched the crypto prices climb each day as I waited on the sidelines, anxious to get in. There was a slight pullback just as my funds were processed, which gave me some reprieve as I finally was able to direct my funds into specified crypto's. Now I  await the staking , eagerly.No problems with customer support, just the process (that's on my 503b account and iTrust).

Review.Titre: Okay site but not drawn to maximize my potential with site as of now
Review.Contenu: I do believe being able to have a crypto ira account is great thing iTrust could make funding  account simpler. Login facial recognition and app is needed for quick access you guys seem distance. I like the thought of having such an account.

Review.Titre: This took 1 month to complete with two…
Review.Contenu: This took 1 month to complete with two personal phone calls.  I made the correction requested but still took two weeks. Also I did not recieve the 100.00 for setting up a new account.Jeff

Review.Titre: The service and the people are great
Review.Contenu: The service and the people are great. The interface is awesome and everyone is very knowledgeable. I would like to see wallet exchanges.I would also like to have a single browser account with multiple retirement account.

Review.Titre: Great product but issues creating accounts
Review.Contenu: I think you offer a great product, in fact both myself and my wife intended to open accounts with you at the beginning of December, however; I was able to open my account but not until 12/31 it was fully funded after multiple support calls. My wife however was no able to open her account even after multiple calls and emails due to an issue validating her account using her phone number. We still intend to open her account and fund both through the years but it was unfortunate to have to struggle so much just to create and fund the accounts.If this happened to both of us I can only imagine how many other people have had similar issues. We were told we would be contacted once the issue is resolved but no news so far.The staff has always been helpful and very respectful. A+ on that point

Review.Titre: I opened Roth IRA account on January…
Review.Contenu: I opened Roth IRA account on January 2021. So far I am satisfied with website. It is user friendly, convenient and easy to understand. Their concept of investing in crypto currencies takes headaches in accounting and cumbersome tax tracking. However, communication  need to be improved where there should be customer support available when needed rather than scheduled phone calling system. Funding need to be improved by letting wire, ach and other electronic means rather than archaic paper system. At present, it is very slow and too many unnecessary steps need to complete the funding process. Overall ITrustCapital in my opinion is one of the best institution to invest in crypto the IRA way. A happy customer so far

Review.Titre: In general
Review.Contenu: In general, customer assistance is supportive.  Due to the demand probably, there is a delay in responding to a message (specified to be 2 business) but it actually took a few more days so some catching up to do.

Review.Titre: Not for casual day trading; 1% fee is a lot.
Review.Contenu: Great for accessibility for trading short term. Wouldn't exactly "day trade" using this platform due to the high 1% fee. Especially in less volatility times. Great front runner choices in crypto but not enough choices in smaller caps crypto. Love the early rewards for the referral program but really is for the big time promoters, not for the casual little guys. The CEO is very informative , transparent and doing great work giving us a chance to invest retirement long term in crypto as there are little choices atm. Would love more perks long term to spice up loyalty in the holding. Don't know when staking will arrive. Would love a modern way of loyalty membership sustainment features to build trust. Get it? iTrust

Review.Titre: There is no monthly statement which the…
Review.Contenu: There is no monthly statement which the tax would need me to disclose the values at the end of year for the Roth IRA. Difficult to get this account information.

Review.Titre: Is easy to apply for a IRA
Review.Contenu: Is easy to apply for a IRA, the problem is when you want to buy BTC or any crypto, is not inmediately it takes 3 to 4 hours to complete the transaction and obviously the price is going to be very different.

Review.Titre: 1st I love the concept of I trust.
Review.Contenu: 1st I love the concept of I trust. The reason for the review is the whole buy and sell set up is got some serious problems. The cost for trades is a 1% fee. But that’s not the all the cost. The buy cost is always higher than any other market that I can find. So you pay more and buy less. Then when you go to sell the price is lower than everyone including their own buy price. So you are taking loss buying and selling over and above the 1% fee!!!! Not to mention they sell you on 24/7 account access. But you can’t set buys and sells you have to do all buys and sells in person. So you have to be awake and on the site 24/7. Which is impossible! Like I said from the beginning I love the concept! But clean up the problems or I’m not sticking around.

Review.Titre: Having to wait 7 days to speak to a…
Review.Contenu: Having to wait 7 days to speak to a representative is a bit excessive. Other than that, process to enroll is simple, selection of coins is good and wire transfer was available in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: Good Customer Service
Review.Contenu: I was able to get back access into my account after having lost it for three weeks. Thank you for fixing this problem and letting me back into my account. I appreciate it. Thank you!

Review.Titre: Acceptable but need some polishing
Review.Contenu: So the online interface is smooth. The largest issues are the on ramp to get setup in the system, followed by the transfer of funds.  These two issues are why you only get three stars. I really like the rest. You guys need to have a live agent that can be called to help with on ramp questions, though the FAQ is good, sometimes a voice with a quick update is best. And scheduling a call two weeks out is unacceptable, a day or two might be fine, but recognize the time in which you live.  As for the transfer of funds, you need to accept bank to bank transfers- ACH. So ridiculous my “bank” had to send a paper check and then I had to wait two weeks for mailing a processing. Total time to complete setup was a month. Also you need to get CARDANO, right NOW!!!

Review.Titre: Recommend
Review.Contenu: Everything works well, just not a fan of your twitter account!  Don’t like when companies feel they have to take shots at their competition.  Don’t lower your standard, let them try to catch you!

Review.Titre: First time investors get professional care.
Review.Contenu: The helpful group at iTrust helped me through my first time experience with contacting, routing of funds.They worked with the appropriate contacts to facilitate a timely exchange of my funds.Kind, friendly, diligent and prompt with responses.Thier group made my first time experience a good oneMany thanks.

Review.Titre: Great customer service team. (Thanks Nadia)
Review.Contenu: I am based out of New York, and iTrustCapital (iTC) came highly recommended to me. I think they are a good and solid company although nearly two years ago; being based out of New York and having my funds sitting in the cryptocurrency XRP; due to some highly questionable tactics done by the SEC to file charges against members of the company Ripple, it likely contributed to iTC stopping its support of the token a couple years back for NY and Hawaii residents given the regulatory uncertainty that it created here in the United States which in turn forced me to have to make the tough decision of having to transfer my funds out to another custodian or have the funds automatically liquidated which I didn't want to do. I also had to take an early distribution on another token I received for holding XRP which I also didn't want to do but is something that I view largely to be the fault of the SEC's actions rather than iTC.Now that the SEC has largely lost in its absurd case against Ripple; and given iTC's move to a new custodian that once again supports XRP as a token; I've made the decision to come back to the platform and hope that nothing rash like what happened with XRP happens again in the future as that would force me to permanently leave the platform the second time around as it was an unpleasant experience having to move the funds back and forth and dealing with some delays which has costed me greatly in terms of lost opportunities over the past couple of years on top of the various fees and taxes that I will be assessed for all the movements. The saving grace through all of this frustration has been the positive experiences that I've had with various members of iTC's service team who are dedicated and genuinely want to help. I most recently had the pleasure of dealing with Nadia who provided me with frequent updates on the progress of my in-kind transfer back into my account. Support at iTC is consistent, and you will typically get a response within 24 hours, and most will go out of their way to provide you with a straight answer rather than just a cookie cutter response that ultimately goes nowhere.

Review.Titre: Mark Morales saved the day
Review.Contenu: Mark Morales saved the day. I had a distribution interview call and apparently booking system failed so got stood up for it. However after sending and asking for a clarification email, I got contacted promptly by Mark Morales explaining situation and solved all my queries and priorized my transactions so no more time would be lost.My impression is that systems for Itrust still are quite manual, but customer service is quite responsive and efficient. Thanks again

Review.Titre: I had an easy time transferring funds…
Review.Contenu: I had an easy time transferring funds into ITC. Any questions I had were promptly answered. I like being able to invest in crypto with funds otherwise locked into traditional investment areas. My biggest wish right now is to be able to request for additional tokens to be available to trade, particularly if there is a significant community push for it.

Review.Titre: Jimmy Herrera has been an ideal service…
Review.Contenu: Jimmy Herrera has been an ideal service rep: professional, efficient and courteous. He helped me with a withdrawal verification phone call. The process leading to the call was frustrating and took weeks to accomplish. Perhaps not enough staff to service your clients?

Review.Titre: My experience
Review.Contenu: The UI\UX could be a lot better but it is functional. Customer service responds to me reasonably quick with answers to my questions. Call experience has been non existent. Seems like every time I tried a call directly iTrust wasn't accepting calls at that time. But overall my experience has not been bad.

Review.Titre: Mark from account support was great
Review.Contenu: Mark from account support was great! He helped me understand the deposit and withdrawal guidelines. He always connected with me when I had questions or concerns. Always, communicative and responsive to calls and texts. Thank you Mark for all the great support!

Review.Titre: Good overall experience
Review.Contenu: iTrust Capital provides good customer service. My questions are always answered in a reasonable time frame. The software is easy to use and fees acceptable. I'm looking forward to a day when an IRA can be funded by scheduled, monthly direct deposit vice wire.

Review.Titre: Grateful that Itrust exist
Review.Contenu: I really like having such low fee crypto IRA platform.  So far all pleasant experience with all my transactions and transfers.  The only reason I'm giving this review a 4 star is the delayed in processing my overcontribution withdraw.  They were able to make the deadline for the tax year, but too lengthy for a perfect rating.

Review.Titre: Sadly I have spent years of my life not…
Review.Contenu: Sadly I have spent years of my life not working 3 jobs.  Itust gives me the chance to put a little aside and take advantage of ups and downs to build and crypto is safer than a company proned bankruptcy but crypto is miner driven.

Review.Titre: Fingerprint and real use crypto
Review.Contenu: I really need to be able to use my fingerprint to login and I would like to see some real work use crypto like quant, VeChain, celo, xrp, hbar.  It would be nice to get into some uranium and platinum.

Review.Titre: I'm very happy with the process and…
Review.Contenu: I'm very happy with the process and idea in general. I just wish the Android version of the app would come out already. I really think all IRAs should allow some crypto allocation. Vanguard lost a good customer to you!

Review.Titre: 4/5 stars
Review.Contenu: ITrustCapital is easy to use, appears very safe from scams/hacks/illiquidity. I would give it 5 stars if they would incorporate a stop/loss feature.

Review.Titre: Transfer Out Woes!!!!!
Review.Contenu: Update:After receiving my review iTrust was quick to not only respond to the Trustpilot review but instantly gave me a call to understand my problem.  Jared at iTrust texted and called me to address my issues.  He then started working with my new IRA custodian to develop a plan for getting my funds over to them.  In the matter of a day the whole situation had been resolved.  I am very satisfied at the customer support and white glove service that was given by Jared.  I have changed my rating and updated this post to reflect.Original Post:I have been trying to track my transfer out to a different IRA.  Which has been apparently mailed out almost a month ago.  My new custodian has not seen the check yet.  I have contacted support a couple times and gotten different stories as to the dates and even where the transfer was being sent.  I have asked for a tracking # to see where the check would be with nothing but crickets.  This is ridiculous and makes me wonder why I am keeping my Roth with them still.

Review.Titre: Rolled over an IRA to iTrust
Review.Contenu: Rolled over an IRA to iTrust.  Each step of the process was well laid out.  Would benefit from a step by step roadmap at the beginning to take you from account set up through purchase of the crypto.  When I had questions, I found the customer service to be quick and helpful.

Review.Titre: ALMOST perfect.
Review.Contenu: ALMOST perfect.. a couple of things that would make Itrust a no brainer.. 1) speed up ACH funding 2) re-list XRP.

Review.Titre: Reduced Trading Fees…
Review.Contenu: For clients with over 100k or who have been with you for over a year (I am both), the trading fees should be reduced to 0.5% IMO.Also, offer BNB! Thank you.George

Review.Titre: Everything  is done very well the only issue  is I have not been able  to log on last couple  of days maybe a glitch  that we'll  stop soon thank you
Review.Contenu: You guys  do a very nice job thanks Just been lodging  in last couple  of days. But I don't get 6 digit number reply ? Other then that great

Review.Titre: Good service, high transaction cost
Review.Contenu: Good service, growing asset list, and reasonable communication are good.  The only issue is the cost of transactions.

Review.Titre: I picked my 9 best coins to invest in…
Review.Contenu: I picked my 9 best coins to invest in and only 1 was able to be staked .More staking should be available .

Review.Titre: One of the best crypto IRA's out there
Review.Contenu: I've been using iTrustCapital for a few years now, and will continue to do so. Whenever I had issues, their customer service got back to me quickly. I just wish they had a fee structure so that high volume traders could benefit from lower fees. I would definitely do more selling/buying if fees were lower.

Review.Titre: Uploading IRA transfer forms
Review.Contenu: Beside having trouble uploading the ira transfer forms because had 2 spaces I thought one for each page After your mail telling me both pages had To be uploaded together. So why did you put 2 upload windows (confusing)In your explanation Should be mentionedThat both pages are to be uploaded together

Review.Titre: even if I lost more than 10K in the…
Review.Contenu: even if I lost more than 10K in the last two months I have a positive hope I will be successful through iTrustCapital. I did not have retirement money and I am above 55 years old. I have a great hope I will get a great benefit from your financial organization for my retirement.

Review.Titre: Crypto Roth IRA
Review.Contenu: I use the platform to fund a Roth IRA. The experience with support  has been great.  Just know, if you are funding a Crypto Roth IRA, iTrustCapital doesn’t take out the taxes you will need to pay at the end of the year.  Also know the selection of Crypto assets is slim compared to other exchanges.  They need to increase the selection greatly.

Review.Titre: 401k rollover from fidelity
Review.Contenu: I found the experience of rolling over my 401k fairly easy. It wasn't very straight forward how to contact someone on the phone but once I did I received great help from someone very polite. I also never did receive an email notifying me that my funds were ready to go, maybe I just didnt see it. I also didn't get a prompt to update my payment method which could be useful for 1st time users.

Review.Titre: Easy to use
Review.Contenu: Easy to use, wish they had more staking options.

Review.Titre: 4 out of 5 stars...still need staking rewards
Review.Contenu: 4 out of 5 stars only for the fact that staking is not available. I have been told (awhile ago) that this feature would be available. Still waiting but once that feature is added I would give a 10 star review out of a 5 star choice. Having your investment grow and support blockchain protocols is extremely important for the success of the protocol. Therefore; setting up a crypto IRA that supports the success of the protocols is a NO BRAINER!!! Thanks again for the outstanding customer service I have recieved in the past. Best wishes and Happy Investing. Scott

Review.Titre: Customer service are very helpful
Review.Contenu: Customer service are very helpful. Whenever I call for some issues there was always someone to answer it. The only concerns I have is the availability of ordering type, staking or private wallet. But I’m hoping somewhere along the line you’ll have these features.

Review.Titre: Easy to use
Review.Contenu: Easy to use. Wish there was an option to also invest in stocks.

Review.Titre: I believed the money to fund the…
Review.Contenu: I believed the money to fund the account would be in the form of an automatic transfer(like with Coinbase). Because I was unaware a wire to transfer funds was required, I missed my 2021 contribution. I can’t blame you completely, however, since the money to fund it was languishing in a checking account just waiting for me to use it for this purpose since December, ‘21.

Review.Titre: The overall process…
Review.Contenu: The overall process of opening and funding an account was pretty straight forward. However, when you are funding from an Employer-funded plan, the process needs a bit more attention to make sure it's completed correctly. Also, it was difficult to get in touch with a live person when the FAQ section did not answer my questions.

Review.Titre: It been fine so far
Review.Contenu: It been fine so far. I would have to say the only issue I do have is the minimum amount you're allowed to deposit which is $1000.00 It will would be a lot more beneficial to me if the minimum was somewhere in the area of $250.00 minimum deposit and not $1000.00 that way it allows you to make quicker deposits because the minimum deposit was easier to gather at one time than the current deposit minimum.  Other than that so far so good. Thank you very much

Review.Titre: So glad to be here!
Review.Contenu: Its really hard to do a review as I'm so new and so is this platform. A few things I would like to see improve in time.1. Chat window for clients when logging in.2. A recurring contribution option to customize amounts and frequency's.3. Faster wire transfers and ACH times to post.Other than that ,I love what this offers and am excited to join in this awesome alternative option for the people. Thank You!Jeff

Review.Titre: Overall I appreciate iTrust services…
Review.Contenu: Overall I appreciate iTrust services and the provided specialization to Crypto currency, however live feedback to address pressing matters a bit slow (have to schedule a call back many days later - too slow when market is 24/7) and unable to talk to live human in critical situation - otherwise would have given 5 stars.

Review.Titre: I enjoy the platform
Review.Contenu: I enjoy the platform, easy to navigate and invest. Be patient while funding, it takes several days for items to clear. Customer service is very good if you take the time to set up a phone call - no live support at this time. Several areas that I have been told they are working on that would make the experience even more fruitful are the following:1. Staking - currently not available2. Setting limit buys - currently not availableHopefully these will be available soon.

Review.Titre: I’ve been very happy w iTrust
Review.Contenu: I’ve been very happy w iTrust. Trading charges are very low compared to other companies. And they’ve been steadily adding cryptos to trade. I feel very secure with them.

Review.Titre: The option to trade Crypto using a Roth…
Review.Contenu: The option to trade Crypto using a Roth IRA is fantastic. What is lacking, is the layout of the Dashboard. It doesn't show the cost average per crypto. Only shows the current price and value of the position. It would be great to have the cost info somewhere easy to access instead of calculating or having a spreadsheet next to you to get that info.

Review.Titre: Saul Goodman
Review.Contenu: Everything is pretty good, from ease-of-use, to communications to security. The only things lacking are the potential staking mentioned in the documentation and asset choices are a bit limited.  Of course, fees could always be lower...All in all, I'm happy I rolled my Roth IRA over to ITrust.PM

Review.Titre: Just set up an iTrust Capital IRA
Review.Contenu: Just set up an iTrust Capital IRA. Mostly good given the new service. Challenges that I find are no limit orders on the trading platform and slippage as much as 1% on a weekend. I understand that this function is coming. I am working out a Roth IRA conversion and appears may not be seamless.

Review.Titre: Pending Review UPDATED
Review.Contenu: UPDATE: iTrust indeed resolved my issue within a day. Original review: I signed up over a week ago and have been left in 'pending review' forever.  I have given them everything they need.  I had a call yesterday with a csr and he said they'd probably have my KYC done yesterday.  Still pending.  I just sent an email request asking about my status.  The last time I did that a response took two days.  I'm getting very frustrated.  The deadline for 2021 contributions is rapidly approaching and I'm afraid I'll miss it.

Review.Titre: Great so far - just allow for trading faster!
Review.Contenu: Overall, it’s been a great service. I really like the referral program and plan to refer some friends. I also really like the clean interface and transparent fees. My only complaint is the time it took for my initial deposit to clear. I use many financial institutions, and it took far more business days than is usual. Since my funds have cleared, I’ve been happy with my experience!!

Review.Titre: Overall service is very good
Review.Contenu: Overall service is very good, website easy to use. Only one thing that I really like to have is to be able to track the performance of the crypto as overall and individually. Basically right now, I don't know if I gain or lose after I invest the crypto cus nowhere to track it. Hope you can learn from Fidelity or Schwab to make the performance info & chart ready, thanks!!

Review.Titre: Bot was initially unable to understand and answer…
Review.Contenu: Bot was unable to understand and answer my question.  I am interested in opening a Roth using the same credentials I used to open my IRA. Is this possible (and how) or do I have to create a separate new account using a different email address? Updated rating from 1 to 4 stars: the response I received from a real person was more helpful. I also found the answer by rewording my imessage for the bot.

Review.Titre: Nice and recommended crypto IRA.
Review.Contenu: I like the low fee operation platform. Nice selection of "blue chip" cryptos.  Trading fees competitive and can still add up but, not an issue for hodlers. Website and set-up is nice and easy to use. Takes a awhile to get everything set up even with cash funding the first time. As with any new cost saving platform, if you need to talk with a human, be prepared to wait a few days. Overall very satisfied vs the competition.

Review.Titre: Transfer Of Funds From Another Provider
Review.Contenu: The bolt problem I had was facilitating transfer of funds from another provider. There was confusion with the other provider as iTrust’s transfer protocols are different than typical. On a positive note ITrust responded to all my questions and requests for information in a timely manner.

Review.Titre: Issues with initial funding, otherwise what I wanted
Review.Contenu: It is hard to communicate with a representative over the phone, email responses are short and half-thought out, and deposits/transfers seem to be forgotten unless the customer follows up, causing an extended hold (over the 3 day) with release of the money being delayed over and over.  It seems once the money is with iTrust, the interface is good though and haven’t had a problem since.

Review.Titre: It’s great that they don’t charge a…
Review.Contenu: It’s great that they don’t charge a maintenance fee for an IRA. Decent amount of coins. Would love to have $LUNA (Terra) Transaction fees are 1% which is okay given you don’t have to report your transactions on your taxes which is the main issue with non IRA accounts. Main drawback is all trades are market price. No stops or limit orders.

Review.Titre: Good Platform
Review.Contenu: It's great to have a hands-on approach to a 401k rather than not like traditional. Great variety of assets representing their respective categories (de-fi, interoperability, etc) With that said, I would love to see airdrops be recognized in the future, specifically for ATOM.

Review.Titre: Choices are very limited.
Review.Contenu: I am a little disappointed in the number of investments available to choose from. There are literally hundreds on the open market but very few of them are included in the choices.UPDATE:After speaking with Jared, I understand the challenges of getting assets added.  I am hopeful that more assets will be added in the future.

Review.Titre: Customer service was an A+. Need a few more top assets.
Review.Contenu: Customer service was an A+! I would like to see a daily, weekly, monthly % gain/loss column as well as get a few more assets to choose from. I personally think it's a waste to see Doge and Shib in the mix as I'm not likely to invest in those in this type of portfolio. Would like to see Avax, Luna, Hbar, Vet and other top 20 assets. Also gaming or metaverse coins are very hot right now and will be in the years to come.

Review.Titre: I really want to register with this…
Review.Contenu: I really want to register with this company, but website has an error (for the last couple of hours) and when calling them it says to contact them through the website.Addition- Thanks for the reply. I'm a US citizen who wants to roll over my 401k. I pay is taxes but I do live abroad. Does that mean I can't use your services?Thanks, Larissa

Review.Titre: Revised review based on iTrust's quick response.
Review.Contenu: My original review: I hate the "self serve" customer service. It's useless. I couldn't log into my accounts this morning (just hung then gave me a 524 error). No way to find out what was going on.I was impressed that a rep called me immediately, apologized and explained that I could e-mail them in the future & he gave me his personal e-mail phone nbr.

Review.Titre: A great alternative to standard IRAs
Review.Contenu: The overall web experience is very good and the site is easy to use. They have one of the most diverse lists of coins to invest in. I would like to see limit ordering and performance charts added eventually. It would also be great if more layer ones such as avax, luna, and ftm and game/metaverse options like mana and sand were added instead of more memes.

Review.Titre: great service
Review.Contenu: great service.  they have worked hard to add to their customer service and it shows.  they are also planning on a major upgrade to their platform that will resolve most of my current smaller issues, which will lead to a 5 star rating at that time ( issues getting solved include: depositing through ACH, staking capability, merging accounts so Roth and traditional ira for one customer can be one account and not two, etc)

Review.Titre: The platform is good
Review.Contenu: The platform is good. It was disappointing that the minimum deposit from my bank was $1000 even after meeting the 2500 initial deposit. I had 550 more that I could put into my Roth IRA, but was not able to do this. Had to put that in an ETrade account instead

Review.Titre: iTrustCapital has excellent customer…
Review.Contenu: iTrustCapital has excellent customer service.  They need to have real time trading data just like Coinbase or any other exchange showing the exact real time price valuations so we can trade more accurately.  I have Coinbase open while buying/selling on iTrust to ensure the price hasn't changed drastically and so I can see graphs of the price history.

Review.Titre: Great to have a retirement acct to invest in Crypto!!
Review.Contenu: Great to have a retirement acct where I can invest in bitcoin and gold & silver now! Easy to use site. Suggest they have a way to generate how your portfolio is performing ( charts) and what shows me what My cost invested vs current market for that investment. Also suggest an easier way to fund it than wiring and checks or roll overs which can take a while (ACH withdraw from my bank acct maybe? ).

Review.Titre: iTrustCapital was easy to work with and…was professional and understood my goals/objectives.
Review.Contenu: iTrustCapital was easy to work with and I highly recommend them for your crypto and precious metals Roth IRA. In fact, the younger you are the sooner you should start! I can't stress this enough. Don't rob and cheat yourself by not acting and doing it now...because the 50 year old future version of yourself will be very appreciative for your wise decision.

Review.Titre: Great platform
Review.Contenu: Great platform!  It us super easy to use!  I would like to see more analytics on my portfolio. Also I would like to see staking options!  I am told they are coming. Finally, it would be good if they could add additional currencies monthly or quarterly!

Review.Titre: Good Crypto IRA, could be Great with a few improvements
Review.Contenu: I compared all of the crypto IRAs available extensively and iTrust definitely has the best package. Easy to use interface, 24/7 tax free trading, reasonable fees, and a wide variety of constantly expanding crypto assets. The two big areas where iTrust falls short are the lack of limit orders, and staking rewards. Supposedly they are in the works but have not heard much news on this in awhile. Overall would and have recommended to family and friends.

Review.Titre: ITrustCapital is just like their name…
Review.Contenu: ITrustCapital is just like their name you can trust them 100%. Calvin who help to solve my issue is very understanding person. He knew how weak my computer skill was and walked me  through patiently to solve my the issue. Steve Jobs once said : in order the company to be successful the company must treat their customers like their own families and Calvin just did that. Thank you

Review.Titre: great option for investing in a crypto…
Review.Contenu: great option for investing in a crypto roth ira.  pros are that the fact it's a crypto roth ira, has an app, and the website and app seem to have a clean interface with fairly simple functionality.  the cons are that they only have a [significantly] limited list of cryptos to invest in, don't offer limit buys or limit sells, and the app has been shutting down to "update and restart" each time i use it for more then 2 minutes for the past few days.  all in all, great service because of the timeliness of what it offers, and the cons all seem to be things that could probably be easily fixed in due time.

Review.Titre: iTrust was very good at keeping in…
Review.Contenu: iTrust was very good at keeping in touch via the emails and following up to make sure that you were making sure that you are aware of what stage the transferring process is in so that you can make sure that account you are transferring is doing what they are supposed to do.   You can also make an appt to talk to someone which can be beneficial the first time you are filling out all the TF forms because it is not always clear which acct number you are supposed to use.

Review.Titre: Overall positive, not perfect
Review.Contenu: Overall positive.  That said I was unable to reach the site to trade from last Thursday night through the following Saturday.  As I understood explanation provided by the Technical Support Representative, security software added to the platform caused the problem.  By the time the situation was resolved the price of cryptos I planned to buy had risen, so I paid more than I would have had I been able to reach site when I received Error 1020, Access denied.

Review.Titre: I see hand proper process. Looking forward to a very messages on the site.
Review.Contenu: The process of transferring money from one trustee to I trust what is relatively simple and straightforward. I kept me informed of the steps. The shortcoming I see today is no limit orders or stop loss capability. I was told this will be happening before the end of the year. That would give them a five

Review.Titre: All good except for transfer times.
Review.Contenu: Pretty easy setup which is nice and no fees should be the standard but the time it takes to get funds into platform is pretty bad.  Most accounts I have credit the transfer same day (etrade, crypto.com, voyager, etc etc all allow use of funds upon transfer).

Review.Titre: It takes to long to move funds...I…
Review.Contenu: It takes to long to move funds...I would rather just have a simple ach direct transaction from bank to my Itrust account.  Crypto people want fast, simple and less fees.   I dont mind paying the monthly fee but do not agree with the inflated price of the asset coupled with the high transaction fee to trade within.Dean

Review.Titre: iTrust Capital experiencing rapid growth
Review.Contenu: Given iTrust Capital rapid growth, I will excuse the difficulty with setup and purchasing. A rep tells me that they have 30 additional employees coming on next week. They say that they intend to make limit trades and staking available. I experienced 1% slippage in addition to 1% trading fee due to lack of limit order availability. Staking is income that should not be foregone. Roth IRA conversion took a couple days longer than promised, during which time I was unable to trade. I have asked for transaction records on my Roth IRA conversion, not immediately available. I expect all these will be taken care of with extra diligence on my part.

Review.Titre: Very cleaver Team ..
Review.Contenu: Great so far .Zack and the team had help me get through this process fairly easy , considering I made a rather stupid mistake when  pulling my funds from the previous investment firm .. great explanation In regards  to the difference between Roth and traditional . Then Found  a solution for my mistake. Seems  to be a great start ..

Review.Titre: Pretty happy with the service
Review.Contenu: Pretty happy with the service. They were excellent moving my money from my original 401k. The website is very easy to use and to sell and trade. I'm not thrilled with the 1% fees every single time to trade which includes both selling and buying, this adds up if you do much movement in your account. I'm very happy to be able to put my 401k in crypto, so all in all it is worth it for sure. Just lower the trading fees, or only do it on the buy and not the sell would be nice.

Review.Titre: Great customer service but lagging in technology
Review.Contenu: Great customer service and a very powerful product. I am waiting for many needed updates on the technology end and the ability to contribute any dollar amount (currently $1000 min) and they need to increase the speed of ACH transactions which are currently taking two weeks.

Review.Titre: Great experience!
Review.Contenu: Great experience and fast setup! The only improvement needed is more coins options and adding the ability to stake. Adding these two things would easily make this a 5 star experience! However, the company is great and in comparison to the market a leader in the product.

Review.Titre: I would have gave ITrust capital a five…
Review.Contenu: I would have gave ITrust capital a five star, but I would have liked the package of IRA and Roth IRA in one fee per customer. I would have transferred my Roth IRA to ITrust but I would have had to spend twice as much in fees. Please fix this so I can feel confident to transfer all my Roth IRA money over.

Review.Titre: iTrust Capital is a great crypto…
Review.Contenu: iTrust Capital is a great crypto platform for retirement and one of the cheapest options available but I’d definitely be really excited when we can start to earn passive income on our owwned crypto. Hope that is a possibility soon! Thanks iTrust Capital-Shawn M. Lewis

Review.Titre: I have found the site is easy to work…
Review.Contenu: I have found the site is easy to work with once I had funded the account. Buying and selling is simple and it up-dates quickly using the dashboard to refresh. Happy getting started with crypto options available but it would be nice to see more added in time. Eric J

Review.Titre: Thus would be 5 stars in everything …
Review.Contenu: Thus would be 5 stars in everything  but price.Several people  I have spoken to about iTrust have baulked at the amount of the monthly fee especially  if the have both a Traditional IRA &a Roth.Beyond that, I am very pleased.  Wish I have made the move earlier.

Review.Titre: A Few Bumps Getting Started, Then Smooth Sailing
Review.Contenu: Had a minor issue during application, 3 requests for support, all unanswered for days.  Slow funding of account after bank withdrawal (6 days).  Had me nervous.  Once able to get down to business, site is easy to use and very clear info.

Review.Titre: Problems with Contributing
Review.Contenu: I decided to open up an IRA with iTrust because the company was recommended by several different trustworthy people. I was able to open an account fine, but the website does not seem user-friendly. My contribution for 2021 went through okay, but I've tried to contribute for 2022 and nothing has happened. I've made the request through the "Contribute" button several times, but there has been no response. I was able to start a transfer from another IRA that I have through another institution, and I did receive an email saying that my request was successful, but it would have been nice to get a notice right after I made my request to let me know that it had gone through.

Review.Titre: So far so good
Review.Contenu: This is a great app for setting up a digital IRA.  My main concern is the communication between user and the exchange. If you have a specific question, timeline or technical issue it's almost impossible to actually talk to someone.  It took over a month to make a simple cash transfer to fund my first account - simply because a wire transfer was not requested.  The second funding was crypto only, again the instructions for doing this were vague and misleading but I was assured that the proper forms would be sent "soon". Still waiting but once it transfers, I will be a happy camper again.

Review.Titre: The Service is straightforward
Review.Contenu: The Service is straightforward; download Itrust app, and provide the necessary information to open an account. Fund the account; Itrust provides several options to do this; personal check, wire funds, rollover of eligible 401k, etc. This is my first IRA roth account, I did not find it complicated.  You can buy and sell crypto for cash, however, one can not trade between crypto. One has to convert an asset back to cash first, and then buy the new asset with the cash earned from the sale, or contribute more funds to the account. One buys assets at market rates, there is no spot trading within the account.  Fees seem reasonable.

Review.Titre: Patience paid off.
Review.Contenu: It was a very difficult process to get my Ira rolled over into  ITRUSTCAPITAL. However it was worth the wait. Purchasing crypto is super easy and affordable compared to other crypto Ira's. I'm glad I made to switch.

Review.Titre: I just started a Roth IRA on…
Review.Contenu: I just started a Roth IRA on itrustcapital, so far everything is working out great. I was a little concerned at first because it took a few days longer for my initial investment to deposit into my account.

Review.Titre: Overall great service and low cost; missing interest accounts
Review.Contenu: Overall great service and low cost. I think ITrust should start focusing on interest baring accounts for clients and even becoming validaters in crypto networks. Being part of the network for each crypto they support I think is important for the future of the space.

Review.Titre: It keeps getting better
Review.Contenu: I'm editing this review to make it even better. I had a great experience signing up and the interface is easy and clean, but I was a little confused on the timing and logistics of funding. I chose "schedule a call" from the help menu and schedule a 15 minute window for my call to be done 2 days later. They sent multiple texts reminding me and they called right on time. I asked questions about the fastest way to fund, could I open 2 IRA's and what were their future plans for staking. The rep was helpful, smart and concise.  REALLY happy with the experience so far.

Review.Titre: We would like to see Staking on the…
Review.Contenu: We would like to see Staking on the Tokens that allow them. This way we continue the build wealth, Also since you charge us a monthly fee can you remove the 1% trading fee?

Review.Titre: Awesome but need staking / passive income
Review.Contenu: Your personnel are top notch and super responsive.  Everything is great however staking and passive income earning like most brokerage exchanges is what’s missing.  Full 5 stars and I’ll convert my friends as soon as you can get that!

Review.Titre: Thank you for your help setting up our…
Review.Contenu: Thank you for your help setting up our IRA accounts. It took a while to find these and get all materials sorted out. Happy to be invested in our future. Counting on more of your great assistance on the future.

Review.Titre: I have loved the customer service so…
Review.Contenu: I have loved the customer service so far. Really great! Very responsive. Thank you! Only a few negatives....I didn't love the fact that I had to use a separate email to create a traditional IRA. (I already had a Roth with iTrust)Also, I would have loved to have seen more options to choose from, like Vechain. But maybe that's coming! (I know you're still new)And lastly, but perhaps most importantly, I'd really like to stake my DOT, Tezos, and ADA, even while it's in my iTrust account. I'm hoping that will happen soon, too.All in all, I am pleased thus far, as I know it's a new company. 😀

Review.Titre: Excellent site for amateurs like myself
Review.Contenu: Excellent site, especially for an amateur like myself. Plenty of enticing cryptos to choose from and I like the ability to trade into bullion if I want. Having to turn my phone sideways to see my balances can be problematic at times.

Review.Titre: SImple & Easy to Use
Review.Contenu: Had some delays in getting account set up but it has been smooth sailing since. Very simple to use. Good selection of coins to choose from. No technical data on coins, so you have to find that information elsewhere.

Review.Titre: Although it took some time to get…
Review.Contenu: Although it took some time to get approved, when I complained your customer service ready came through for me and got me approved. Since I am only 18, I plan on being a very long term customer.

Review.Titre: It's going great so far
Review.Contenu: It's going great so far. Super easy interface and genuine scheduled customer service. I'm just waiting for the ability to stake which has been mentioned to be arriving this year. That will be the fifth star game changer...

Review.Titre: The hold time for a check issued by…
Review.Contenu: The hold time for a check issued by another large financial institution is unreasonable. Why the 3 day hold? Its ironic that to invest in crypto one has to wait for 3 days for their own funds!!

Review.Titre: Easy transfer
Review.Contenu: I just moved both a traditional and a Roth IRA to ItrustCapital. They were very responsive to any questions and concerns I had about the transfer process.Trent was instrumental facilitating these transactions.

Review.Titre: Website is moving in the right direction
Review.Contenu: Excellent choice to drop the monthly fees. Between the 1% trading commission and the "spread" on the price, iTrust is doing just fine. Next up - needs the ability for LIMIT orders ASAP! (Will be a HUGE timesaver for me not to have to monitor prices constantly.) Dollar cost averaging (recurring purchases would be a nice touch. Also, I'm worried, when the time comes to sell, that restricting trading to ONE order at a time will NOT be good! Please add the ability to submit multiple orders simultaneously or, at least, add a SELL ALL function either at the coin level or the portfolio level. I could go on but let's get these taken care of and then reevaluate and move forward. :-)

Review.Titre: Wish you were Bitcoin only.
It would be nice to be able to call and…
Review.Contenu: It would be nice to be able to call and talk to somebody a little faster. And more information on the website for me to access like how much I contributed to last year and or this year to my Roth

Review.Contenu: The experience thus far has been fairly smooth. This would be a 5-star rating if it were not for the 3+ week fund transfer timeline (delays on iTrust's side, not Vanguard who was transferring the funds).

Review.Titre: Excellent platform, lack staking for now
Review.Contenu: Great customer service, easy transfer and trading platform.  I very pleased with iTrustCapital.  I would like to see staking options apparently coming in 2022 and more coin options, especially ETH coins.

Review.Contenu: Customer service is great..Its nice to be able to talk to people in person and not just email..not sure yet how to withdraw money without being linked to a bank..Or if thats even an option at this time..

Kudos to Anthony, who ensured prompt routing of my rollover check once he received it from UPS. Adam was cordial and ensured that I new the approximate time and date my funds would be available, and he was spot on. And last but certainly not least, the most interactive and caring of all was Jared, who coddled me through the entire process as if I were a close family member, and he should be commended, deserving all accolades available to bestow on him. I'm more than satisfied with my iTrust experience to date and would recommend them to anyone seeking a comfortable retirement haven. From a Retired U.S Marine, OOHRAH and SEMPER FI iTrust Team!

Thank you Jimmy for time and effort! You're a Rockstar!

Review.Titre: My experience with iTrustCapital has…

Jimmy called exactly when he was supposed to and the call took only about  5 minutes. I received a follow up call from Jimmy later in the day to inform me that a wire transfer was needed instead of the direct deposit we had set up. He wanted to make sure this was ok with me. End result is that when I decide it's time for another withdrawal I'm hoping Jimmy is the Rep I will be dealing with.

Review.Titre: Jimmy Herrera and Gladis Miranda are excellent

Gladis sent me prompt emails at every step that explained the process and what I needed to provide and sign. A micro amount was sent to my crypto wallet within a few days of my original request, and on my confirmation of receiving it Gladis sent me the link to schedule my phone consultation to confirm my identification and authority. I was able to get an appointmenr the very next day. Jimmy Herrera was very competant communicative, and eased my security concerns.
